recipe.title: Mild Chicken Curry (Sauce Only)
recipe.subtitle: Thermomix TM7 adaptation of Gousto #1995 (no rice)

step.title: Chop aromatics
step.instruction: Add onion (halved), garlic and ginger to mixing bowl. Chop.

step.title: Sauté base
step.instruction: Add vegetable oil and a pinch of salt. Sauté.

step.title: Add chicken
step.instruction: Optional: insert Butterfly. Add diced chicken. Sauté until just coloured.

step.title: Spices & paste
step.instruction: Add turmeric, garam masala and tomato paste. Cook to bloom spices.

step.title: Tomatoes & stock
step.instruction: Add chopped tomatoes, chicken stock, boiling water and sugar. Cook.
step.note: Check chicken is cooked through; extend 2–3 min if needed.

step.title: Finish with cream
step.instruction: Remove Butterfly (if used). Add clotted cream and mix to combine.

step.title: Serve
step.instruction: Serve the mild chicken curry over your cooked rice of choice.

notes.note: For 4 servings: double all ingredients. Keep times and speeds the same.
MC = measuring cup. Basket on lid prevents splatter during sauté/simmer.
